# Kazan Delicacies — Halal Product Catalog API
# 77 halal meat products and Tatar pastries. Live prices in 7 currencies.

## Endpoints (no auth required)
- Search: https://api.pepperoni.tatar/api/search?q={query}&lang=en&limit=10
- Product by SKU: https://api.pepperoni.tatar/api/product/{sku}?lang=en
- Full catalog: https://api.pepperoni.tatar/api/products?lang=en
- Export (Excel/CSV): https://api.pepperoni.tatar/api/export?lang=en&currency=USD&format=xlsx
- OpenAPI spec: https://api.pepperoni.tatar/openapi.yaml
- Static catalog: https://api.pepperoni.tatar/products.json

## Data
- 77 products: pepperoni, sausages, ham, smoked meats, kazylyk, Tatar pastries
- Sections: Frozen (25), Refrigerated (33), Bakery (19)
- Currencies: RUB, USD, KZT, UZS, KGS, BYN, AZN
- Filters: ?search, ?section, ?category, ?sku, ?lang=en
- Halal certified #614A/2024 (DUM RT). HACCP. Private Label available.
- Updated: daily (GitHub Actions sync from Google Sheets)

## Company
Kazan Delicacies (Казанские Деликатесы)
https://kazandelikates.tatar | info@kazandelikates.tatar | +7 987 217-02-02
EXW Kazan, Russia
